## dates class

Utility class for dealing with days

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class dates 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [format(date, format)](./forms42core.dates.format.md) | <code>static</code> | Format a given date using a format (or default format) |
|  [getDays(start)](./forms42core.dates.getdays.md) | <code>static</code> | Get next 7 days of week |
|  [getTokenType(token)](./forms42core.dates.gettokentype.md) | <code>static</code> | Get the DatePart of a giveb token i.e. DD, MM, ... |
|  [parse(datestr, format, withtime)](./forms42core.dates.parse.md) | <code>static</code> | parse a date-string into a Date using a given format. Optionally include the time part |
|  [tokenizeDate(date, format)](./forms42core.dates.tokenizedate.md) | <code>static</code> | Tokenize a given date into the DateTokens |
|  [tokenizeFormat(format)](./forms42core.dates.tokenizeformat.md) | <code>static</code> | Split a given format into FormatTokens |
|  [validate()](./forms42core.dates.validate.md) | <code>static</code> | check the format mask |
